articles.description: Newcastle United are set to head to Saudi Arabia next month, where Eddie Howe will meet club chairman Yasir Al-Rumayyan.
articles.content:
Newcastle United are set to head to Saudi Arabia next month, where Eddie Howe will meet club chairman Yasir Al-Rumayyan.

articles.title: Huddersfield Town looking to make statement by getting one over on West Bromwich Albion - Yorkshire Live
articles.description: The likes of Brahima Diarra and Brodie Spencer are being lined up to feature at the John Smith's Stadium on Friday evening as the B team face a challenging cup game
articles.content: Huddersfield Town's next generation have the opportunity to ruffle a few feathers when the B team take on reigning Premier League Cup champions West Bromwich Albion in the group stage of this season'… [+1825 chars]

articles.author: Liam Prenderville
articles.title: Snooker fist pump row as David Gilbert 'didn't appreciate' Shaun Murphy celebration - The Mirror
articles.description: Shaun Murphy progressed to the next round of the UK Championship with a 6-5 win but his celebrations during the match split opinion among snooker fans
articles.content:
Shaun Murphy appeared to annoy opponent David Gilbert with his celebrations during their UK Championship match.
